name: OakTown
description:
You have arrived in Oak Town to wed the princess! the most capsular princess in all the land! But first you must complete the King's grueling trials to prove your worthiness!

press keys when told to! if you do before I say so, its cheating!!

this game started off as just a way of showing my understanding of unity and fungus(barely any), but when I played it through, I found it to be an insight into my own interests in and outside of games.

Play around with it, and see if you can see what I saw!...c
